Articles.Content: I was always wondering is this even possible to implement? Riding a storm in Jool atmosphere would be a great experience. Unfortunately, I have a bad suspicion that this cannot be implemented. There are visual mods that can provide you with what at least looks like a dust storm on Duna or snow on Kerbin, for example, but there is no wind. Are there any mods that provide you with winds/bad weather?

None that I know of, unfortunately.

I would love it if someone were to make something like this.
There was a mod for weather and random wind gusts somewhere... However, no visual effects.
